queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find DataStore with 
  region ~= ('us' or 'US') or 
  location ~= ('us' or 'US') or
  zone ~= ('us' or 'US')
return
  DataStore._class as _class,
  DataStore._type as _type,
  DataStore.id as id,
  DataStore.displayName as displayName,
  DataStore.location as location, DataStore.region as region, DataStore.zone as zone, 
  DataStore.tag.AccountName as AccountName,
  DataStore.classification as classification,
  DataStore.owner as owner,
  DataStore.createdOn as createdOn,
  DataStore.public as public,
  DataStore.encrypted as encrypted,
  DataStore.webLink as webLink

queries.name: query2
queries.query:
Find DataStore 
that has (Service|Account) with 
  region ~= ('us' or 'US') or 
  location ~= ('us' or 'US') or
  zone ~= ('us' or 'US') as e
return
  DataStore._class as _class,
  DataStore._type as _type,
  DataStore.id as id,
  DataStore.displayName as displayName,
  e.location as location, e.region as region, e.zone as zone, 
  DataStore.tag.AccountName as AccountName,
  DataStore.classification as classification,
  DataStore.owner as owner,
  DataStore.createdOn as createdOn,
  DataStore.public as public,
  DataStore.encrypted as encrypted,
  DataStore.webLink as webLink

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find DataStore with 
  region ~= ('us' or 'US') or 
  location ~= ('us' or 'US') or 
  zone ~= ('us' or 'US')
return count(DataStore) as value

queries.name: query2
queries.query:
Find DataStore 
that has (Service|Account) with
  region ~= ('eu' or 'EU') or 
  location ~= ('eu' or 'EU') or
  zone ~= ('eu' or 'EU') as e
return
  DataStore._class as _class,
  DataStore._type as _type,
  DataStore.id as id,
  DataStore.displayName as displayName,
  e.location as location, e.region as region, e.zone as zone, 
  DataStore.tag.AccountName as AccountName,

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find DataStore with 
  (region !~= ('eu' or 'EU' or 'us' or 'US') and region != undefined) or
  (location !~= ('eu' or 'EU' or 'us' or 'US') and location != undefined) or
  (zone !~= ('eu' or 'EU' or 'us' or 'US') and zone != undefined) or
  (region = undefined and location = undefined and zone = undefined)
that !has (Account|Service|Host) with 
  region ~= ('eu' and 'EU' and 'us' and 'US') or
  location ~= ('eu' and 'EU' and 'us' and 'US') or 
  zone ~= ('eu' and 'EU' and 'us' and 'US')
return count(DataStore) as value

  (region = undefined and location = undefined and zone = undefined)
that !has (Account|Service|Host) with 
  region ~= ('eu' and 'EU' and 'us' and 'US') or
  location ~= ('eu' and 'EU' and 'us' and 'US') or
  zone ~= ('eu' and 'EU' and 'us' and 'US')
return
  DataStore._class as _class,

  DataStore.classification as classification,

  DataStore.webLink as webLink
